The documentation recommends using Manifest Manager Utility when publishing via ClickOnce.

This utility does not work with .Net Framework 4 - it will not write out the .application file correctly.

Hi,

Thanks for your feedback. This topic was also treated in the following forum thread:

  • ClickOnce for Prism

In Prism v4 the ClickOnce documentation section has not been updated yet. However, the product team has plans on updating this on the final release of Prism. Additionally, the tool you mentioned could be out of date for .Net 4 and I don’t know if there is any official plan to get this updated.

The other forum tread has been copied as a workitem here, so you could vote. 

Please let me know if this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
FYI - we have just updated this tool so it works fine with .NET 4.0 this week and should be releasing it soon via the downloads section here on the codeplex site.
